TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Extension extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData

span.span: Represents an X509 extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks X509 扩展是动态的扩展属性，可以添加到 X509 证书中，并且更改。X509 extensions are dynamic, extended properties that can be added to an X509 certificate and changed. 类可以用于创建与证书相关联，但不是证书的一部分，由证书颁发机构 (CA) 颁发的扩展。The class can be used to create extensions that are associated with a certificate but are not part of a certificate as issued by a certification authority (CA). 按照其最基本的形式，X509 扩展具有对象标识符 (OID)、 布尔值，描述是否扩展被认为是严重或不是和 ASN 编码数据。In its most basic form, an X509 extension has an object identifier (OID), a Boolean value describing whether the extension is considered critical or not, and ASN-encoded data. 可以按注册自定义扩展文件。Custom extensions can be registered in a file. .Net Framework 包括的几个常见 X509 实现扩展：The.NET Framework includes implementations of several common X509 extensions: - 。. 描述证书的密钥用法。Describes the key usages of a certificate. - 。. 描述证书的约束。Describes the constraints for a certificate. - 。. 描述证书的增强密钥用法。Describes the enhanced key usages of a certificate. - 。. 描述的密钥标识符。Describes the key identifier. 例如，用于 XMLDSIG。For example, used with XMLDSIG. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个空对象，与不同的其他构造函数的此类使用从字节数组、 指针或证书文件的证书信息来创建对象。This constructor creates an empty object, unlike the other constructors for this class that use certificate information from either a byte array, a pointer or a certificate file to create the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: Copies the extension properties of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将复制指定的扩展属性并将其添加到的实例类从其调用此方法。Use this method to copy the extension properties of the specified and add them to the instance of the class from which this method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates using the class.
